endportalrecipe-fabric.duskconfig.title: End Portal Recipe Config
endportalrecipe-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_m: If enabled, players can only break portal frames if they have silk touch on their pickaxe.
endportalrecipe-fabric.duskconfig.mustHa: Must Have Silk Touch To Break Portal
endportalrecipe-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_a: If enabled, add portal frames directly to the player's inventory to lower the chance of them being destroyed. Still drops the item entity if the inventory is full.
endportalrecipe-fabric.duskconfig.addBro: Add Broken Portal Frames To Inventory
endportalrecipe-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_s: Whether a message should be sent to the player where the extra dragon egg will drop.
endportalrecipe-fabric.duskconfig.sendMe: Send Message On Extra Dragon Egg Drop
